summary: This document is a Credit Agreement dated November 14, 2025, involving YELLOWSTONE INTERCO HOLDINGS, LLC, YELLOWSTONE BORROWER, LLC, various lenders and issuing banks, and WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as the Administrative Agent. The agreement outlines the terms for a $150 million term loan and a $140 million revolving loan facility, including commitments, borrowing procedures, repayment terms, and various covenants and conditions. It also details representations and warranties, affirmative and negative covenants, events of default, and the roles and responsibilities of the Administrative Agent.
